original: Taṁ me idaṁ taṁ nu kadā bhavissati.
analyzed: tat me idam tam nu kadā bhavissati
rāgan ca dosan ca tathā iva moha

original: Eko vane taṁ nu kadā bhavissati.
analyzed: ekaḥ vane tam nu kadā bhavissati
kadā nuham bhaya jananim dukha āvaha
chetvā vase tam pi kadā bhavissati
kadā nu paññā maya mugga teja
mā aram sa senam sahasā bhañjissa

original: Kadā nu maṁ tandi khudā pipāsā,
Kadā nu kho yaṁ viditaṁ mahesinā,
analyzed: kadā nu khalu yam viditam mahā isinā

original: Paññāya taṁ taṁ nu kadā bhavissati.
analyzed: paññāya tam tam nu kadā bhavissati

original: Kadā nu rūpe amite ca sadde,
analyzed: kadā nu rūpe amite ca sadde
paññāya daccham tat idam kadā me

original: Tuṭṭho na hessaṁ tadidaṁ kadā me.
analyzed: tuṭṭhaḥ na hessam tat idam kadā me

original: Kadā nu kaṭṭhe ca tiṇe latā ca,
analyzed: kadā nu kaṭṭhe ca tiṇe latā ca
samam tuleyyam tat idam kadā me
kadā nu mama pāvusa kāla meghaḥ
kadā nu gaṅgam yamunam saraḥ sati
kadā nu nāgā uva asaṅga cārī

original: Jhāne yuto taṁ nu kadā bhavissati.
analyzed: jhāne yutaḥ tam nu kadā bhavissati
agāra vāsena alam nu te idam
nanu aham citta tayā amhi yācitaḥ

original: Kulamhi mitte ca piye ca ñātake,
analyzed: kulamhi mitte ca piye ca ñātake
khiḍḍa aratim kāma guṇam ca loke

original: Athopi tvaṁ citta na mayha tussasi.
Mameva etaṁ na hi tvaṁ paresaṁ,
analyzed: mama iva etam na hi tvam paresa
tissaḥ ca vijjā phusa buddha sāsane

original: Yato ca dukkhaṁ samudeti taṁ jaha;
analyzed: yatas ca dukkham samudeti tam jaha
suññam anattā ati agham vadhanti ca
mūle tarum chettu tam eva icchasi
na te karissam vacanam idān iha
dukkhā hi kāmā kaṭukā mahat bhayā
na citta hetū na ca dūra kantanā
ājīva hetū ca aham na nikkhami

original: Kato ca te citta paṭissavo mayā.
analyzed: kataḥ ca te citta paṭissavaḥ mayā
taṇhā avijjā ca piya apiyam ca

original: Sabbattha te citta vaco kataṁ mayā,
analyzed: sabbattha te citta vaco katam mayā
dukkhe ciram sa saritam tayā kate
tvañc eva naḥ citta karosi brāhmaṇaḥ

original: Vessā ca suddā ca bhavāma ekadā,
analyzed: vessā ca suddā ca bhavāmaḥ ekadā
devattanam vā api tava iva vāhasā
kiñca api te citta virādhitam mayā
satthā ca me lokam imam adhiṭṭhahi

original: Na te idaṁ citta yathā purāṇakaṁ,
analyzed: na te idam citta yathā purāṇaka
su nīla gīvā su sikhā su pekhunā
na ga antare viṭapi samaḥ sayissa
tathā tu kassāmi yathā api issaro

original: Yaṁ labbhati tenapi hotu me alaṁ;
analyzed: yam labbhati tena api hotu me ala
na tāham kassāmi yathā a tanditaḥ
tathā tu kassāmi yathā api issaro

original: Yaṁ labbhati tenapi hotu me alaṁ;
analyzed: yam labbhati tena api hotu me ala
tam me su guttam satiyā su bhāvita
a sa sayam citta parā bhavissasi

original: Narā ca nārī ca anubhonti yaṁ sukhaṁ;
analyzed: narā ca nārī ca anubhonti yam sukha
